channel.title: HEEELLLLPPPPPPPP! need major help
channel.description:
[size=20pt]SO ANYONE WHO HAS CURRENT EXPERIENCE W/CODING WILLING TO BE MY PARTNER IN CODING MESSAGE ME. I will setup a http for the server and when this goes big, half te profit will go to you. 50/50. I have already made a PS called stonedpkz(about 2 year ago it was big on xtremetop100, it was #3) so i halfway know what i am doing so i am not a complete NUB.[/size]
okay, had te get that out.. ^^^ Now, my problem is that i have a source, and i am atm making a server from it. I have the knowledge on how to code servers(made stonedpkz) but am a bit rusty(have not been near a pc in over 8 months) So, that leads up to my question. How do i edit what it says when you login, ex. "welcome to ______scape". or "owner ______ has logged on". MUCH MUCH MUCH appreciation to whoever can help me out. IF anyone has aim,windows live or yahoo my SN for aim is sp0ok121, windows live messanger is cabellion@hotmail.com yahoo is thuglove4lyfe92. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE message me on either of those for your assistance!
PS> dont think tat that is all my question and what i need help with. I have ALOT more questions to ask on this because i am using a 317 not a 508 source.

item.title: HEEELLLLPPPPPPPP! need major help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Yorchi elite, post:5, topic:324177”]Just find you welcome message and add this

if(playerRights == 3)
{
Sm(“Welcome to _____Scape”);
yell(“Owner “+playername+” is on.”);
}[/quote]

lol. wtf is that.

Read full topic

item.title: HEEELLLLPPPPPPPP! need major help
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

Well, just add it yourself then. Because you obviously have a pretty empty source. I’m not going to sit here and type a long reply all night. I have to be to my classes in 3 hours. So I want to get a little sleep atleast. But yeah, all I can tell you is try to add it yourself. Download any random server, or use an old client. Try the old copy and paste trick. Gl to you

grr…

item.title: HEEELLLLPPPPPPPP! need major help
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Log in to your server then ctrl+f in the client.java whatever appears when you login.
